question: About how tall can mid-ocean ridges be?

nodes.text: Mid-ocean ridges can be about 2 meters tall.
Mid-ocean ridges can be about 2 feet tall.
Mid-ocean ridges can be about 2 inches tall.
Mid-ocean ridges can be about 2 km tall.
